title: Magic Collection 3 in 1 Edge Brush (3 Pack)
description: A 3 in 1 Edge Brush (3 Pack). Perfect for any edge control gel application, Two types of end for versatile use. Enough to help smooth the edges, clean the hair, fits for baby hairs, temples and hairs. It can refine the appearance of your hair, arrange the messy edges and make hairs smooth. Smooth yet firm when brushing, the bristles don't tug or scratch your skin. Use it to help sculpt short, unruly baby hairs and tame flyaways near your hairline for a neat and polished look.
